responses.text: Why do you still use cash?

dynamic_line: No, no... Well, maybe a little.  It was just as wrecked down here as it is up top when I found it, wasn't too hard to fix up.  You're welcome to stay in the spare room awhile, just don't hog it.  You're not the only scav out there.
Just a scav who got lucky.  Now I'm content to sit around here on my pile of treasure.  I'm more than willing to trade if you've got the cash.
Why not?  Everyone else does, so I suppose that's all that matters.  My ATM over there still works, connected to the bank servers and everything.
I suppose I am.  Scavs like you need supplies, right?  And I could always use more money.
Not at the moment, check back later perhaps.
